author: Upper Echelon
description:
Go to https://surfshark.com/echelon or use code ECHELON at checkout to get 4 extra months of Surfshark VPN!


After receiving what feels like a perfectly timed email, it seems that China is once again inviting social media influencers to make propaganda videos about the culture and technology of the Peoples Republic. 

Having done it once before with Indonesian creators, all signs point to a new round of youtubers, TikTokers, Instagram creators and more... being invited across the world on the Parties dime, to make flattering content about whatever it is they want you to say. 

I for one am rejecting the offer, but prepare yourselves for a specially curated flood of positive content about China across a variety of platforms in the near future.

title: China Asked Me To Make PROPAGANDA
